info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (CentOS; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Content-Length: 361 Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=93600,h3-29=":443"; ma=93600,quic=":443"; ma=93600; v="43" Cache-Control: max-age=0 Content-Type: text/html Date: Thu, 22 May 2025 19:37:48 GMT Mime-Version: 1.0 Access Denied

Access Denied

You don't have permission to access "http://example.com/" on this server.

Reference #18.b5380760.1747942667.49368609

https://errors.edgesuite.net/18.b5380760.1747942667.49368609
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: example.com' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (CentOS; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' 'https://example.com'

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: Wildcard TLS Certificate
author: lucky0x0d
info.description: Checks a sites certificate to see if there are wildcard CN or SAN entries.

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43559
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43559
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
example.com.	3879	IN	NS	a.iana-servers.net.
example.com.	3879	IN	NS	b.iana-servers.net.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22419
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22419
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
example.com.	9387	IN	MX	0 .

info.name: DNSSEC Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) are enabled. The Delegation of Signing (DS) record provides information about a signed zone file when DNSSEC enabled.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3347
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 DS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3347
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 DS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
example.com.	20590	IN	DS	370 13 2 BE74359954660069D5C63D200C39F5603827D7DD02B56F120EE9F3A86764247C

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3002
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3002
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
example.com.	3600	IN	SOA	ns.icann.org. noc.dns.icann.org. 2025011650 7200 3600 1209600 3600

info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1164
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1164
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
example.com.	86400	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 -all"
example.com.	86400	IN	TXT	"_k2n1y4vw3qtb4skdx9e7dxt97qrmmq9"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1164
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1164
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;example.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
example.com.	86400	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 -all"
example.com.	86400	IN	TXT	"_k2n1y4vw3qtb4skdx9e7dxt97qrmmq9"

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37398
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.example.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37398
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.example.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.example.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1;p=reject;sp=reject;adkim=s;aspf=s"
